title: Accelerated English Education Instructional Design Scenario for Middle School

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Learners are prospective teachers or job seekers in English education, requiring theoretical and practical knowledge of middle school English curriculum design and accelerated learning strategies. The goal is to cultivate instructional design capabilities applying integrated curriculum models and culturally responsive design principles

learning_goals: Learners can establish a design plan to complete a 2-year middle school English curriculum within 1 year by applying an integrated curriculum model.
Learners can develop and propose lesson materials and implementation strategies reflecting culturally responsive design principles.
Learners can design assessment tools (rubrics) supporting online platform-based collaborative learning and establish project-based assessment operation plans.

resources: Middle School English Standard Curriculum Documents and Cultural Diversity Educational Materials

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
